markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Running Tackle](/Feats.aspx?ID=3399) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Open" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=123" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 127</row>

**Archetype** [Wrestler](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=127)

**Prerequisites**
[Wrestler Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3394)

</column>

---

You charge toward your opponent, throwing your body at them in a vicious tackle. Stride up to your Speed and then make an [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) melee Strike. If you hit, you can attempt to [Shove](/Actions.aspx?ID=38) the target.
name: Running Tackle
